summary: Meredith Grey is the main character in the TV show *Grey's Anatomy*. She's a doctor, starting as an intern and becoming a surgeon at Seattle Grace Hospital. Meredith is played by Ellen Pompeo. She's the daughter of a famous surgeon and has to balance her career, relationships, and motherhood. She's good friends with her colleagues, especially Cristina, Izzie, Alex, and George. Meredith also narrates the show. Critics and fans love her character, and Pompeo has won many awards for her performance.
title: Meredith Grey
